Model.Name: An Artificial Neural Network for Nasogastric Tube Position Decision Support

Reference.Authors: Drozdov I, Dixon R, Szubert B, Dunn J, Green D, Hall N, Shirandami A, Rosas S, Grech R, Puttagunta S, Hall M, Lowe DJ
Reference.Title: An artificial neural network for nasogastric tube position decision support

Author.Name: Ignat Drozdov
Author.Address: Bering Limited, 54 Portland Place, 2nd Floor, London W1B 1DY, England

Model.Time to train model: The low-resolution (764 x 764 pixel) and high-resolution (1024 x 1024 pixel) models trained for 16 and 19 epochs, respectively
Model.Comments: Neural network ensemble using modified InceptionV3 architecture with high and low resolution inputs.
